text: Measles vaccination has saved an estimated 57 million lives worldwide since 2000! 🙌💉 This is a huge win for global health, and a testament to what we can achieve when we work together. Let's keep up the good work and ensure that every child has access to life-saving vaccines! #MeaslesVaccine #GlobalHealth #ImmunizationAgenda2030 💪🏼💉
